content: Nice game overall, combat is abit too fast, would be nice if we can control the speed like 1x and 2x. Cost of skins / hero roll is way too expensive considering how hard it is to get diamonds. Keep up the good work devs, hopefully there's a new feature to use more than 3 units in the future!
replyContent: I will improve it. Thank you.! :)

content: Love the game. Battles are turn based with ATBs set on active so you're constantly strategizing what actions you want to make. Doesn't get too repetitive since the game gives you a couple tools/characters to work with. Only thing I don't like is that you have to be online to start the game. For a single player game like this that you already have to buy, I don't see why it's necessary unless you want to count the leader board. If I paid for the game, I expect it to allow you to play offline.

Pretty cool game though there are a few things I can see that may become annoying over time Gems: only awarded from getting to a higher floor or pick up from dungeon floor, 1 from higher floor and 2 from pick up, a single character is 50 gems, ranging from 1 to 5 star, seems a little lacking Soul stones: 1000 seems a little bit much to promote characters imo, they drop often but it's gonna take a very long time Keys: often none spawn for multiple floors so I often ignore chests all together
I will be honest this game has developed into a damn cool game, its worth to buy it, so much fun.
Definitely fun and different! Worth the download to support the devs! It's worth the money with everything! Go download it now!
replyContent: Thank you. Brother! I will work hard to update for you! The paid version has 50 more starting diamonds than the free version.

content: 던전공주 전작을 100시간도 훌쩍넘게 해와서 그런지 많이 기다린 보람이 있네요. 전반적으로 게임 자체가 전부 상향평준화가 이뤄진 모습이고 굉장히 게임 자체가 재밌습니다. 전보다 유료결제가 조금 더 중요해진듯 싶지만 그건 개발자님이 잘 맞춰주실거라 믿습니다 잘 만들어주셔서 감사합니다 앞으로도 많은 업데이트 기대할게요!
replyContent: 감사합니다~! 더 재밌게 꾸준하게 업데이트 하겠습니다~!
